name: Can we talk?
description:
A visual novel where you play as a monster. Outcasted and doomed to solitude. You hear gossip from the rabbits about this "new terrifying monster in the forest". Who is this beast? Could they be similar to you? Could they be your first friend?

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

- TRIGGER WARNING: mentions of suicidal thoughts

- 10-15 minutes to complete

- One ending

It's HERE! It's FREE! There's a SURPRISE after finishing it!

This is an assignment from two troubled students! Help us pass our assignment by leaving a comment or sending an email to: canwetalk.studentproject@gmail.com
